meanings.definition: Sold in large quantities for resale.
meanings.sent1: The wholesaled products filled the shelves of the store.
meanings.sent2: The wholesaled items were perfect for stocking up the shop.
meanings.sent3: The wholesaled goods made the shop owner very happy.
meanings.sent4: The wholesaled merchandise transformed the store into a bustling market.
meanings.sent5: The wholesaled goods brought a sense of abundance to the store.

meanings.definition: To sell in large quantities for resale.
meanings.sent1: The company wholesaled their products to retailers across the country.
meanings.sent2: She wholesaled her handmade crafts to various stores.
meanings.sent3: The farmer wholesaled his crops to the local market.
meanings.sent4: The distributor wholesaled the electronics to different vendors.
meanings.sent5: They wholesaled the clothing items to online stores for a profit.
